forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending this morning. Remaining cloudy. High 14C. SSE winds at 15 to 30 km/h, decreasing to 5 to 10 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
